channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Fed Beige Book says ‘pervasive’ uncertainty from trade fights depresses outlook for economy
item.description: Economy gets short-term boost from buyers trying to avoid tariffs

item.title: General Dynamics CEO on Trump tariffs: Don’t ask
item.description: General Dynamics CEO Phebe Novakovic won’t comment on potential tariff impacts — saying that with all the uncertainty, any estimate would be “sheer sp...

item.title: ‘I find it ridiculous’: My friend cleaned out her father’s bank account. Should I intervene?
item.description: “Before you accuse me of being pea green with envy, I have more savings, own properties, and have all my debts paid.”

item.title: Why Apple investors might be too optimistic about what’s ahead
item.description: UBS analysts worry that the next iPhone launch will be lackluster, meaning Wall Street’s expectations for next year are too high.

item.title: Are tariffs worth the risk to our retirement — and overall — economic security?
item.description: Raucous debate clarified the national defense case for strategic tariffs, but it’s hard to argue for a worldwide tariff war

item.title: This major bank stock is about to hit resistance and turn lower, says Carter Worth
item.description: The chart analyst breaks down Morgan Stanley shares.

item.title: Healthcare Services Group Inc. (HCSG) Surges 20% on Strong Q1 Earnings and Revenue Growth
item.description: As the healthcare industry continues to navigate a complex landscape, one company that’s making waves is Healthcare Services Group Inc. (NASDAQ:HCSG)....

item.title: Several Wall Street shops trim their Apple price targets ahead of earnings next week
item.description: Multiple banks pulled back their target prices for shares ahead of the company's quarterly financial report.

item.title: Chip stocks could fall another 30% if a recession hits, according to KeyBanc analysis
item.description: Semiconductor stocks could see a double-digit plunge from here if a recession hits the U.S. economy, KeyBanc Capital Markets projects.

item.title: Pony AI Inc. Unveils Seventh-Generation Robotaxi Lineup, But Can the Stock Keep Up with Its Ambitious Plans?
item.description: As of this writing, Pony AI Inc.’s (Nasdaq: PONY) stock price has surged 29.57% to $5.39 per share, making it one of the biggest gainers in the market...

item.title: A retail stock that can skirt the tariff trouble because of sourcing in Honduras, according to Citi
item.description: This clothing manufacturer is in ‘a relatively strong position’ when it comes to Trump’s tariffs, says Citi analyst Paul Lejuez.

item.title: Bernstein says there's a buying opportunity in this fast-casual food chain that can rally 40%
item.description: The firm raised its rating on the stock to outperform from market perform.
